default to the first frame. Go into your
level sequence here, find the control
rig track, and hit this button. Set a
new key on everything. This will key
every control in the entire rig, which
is a really, really good first step to
do. Obviously, I also have auto key
turned on, which I would highly
recommend. And now that I have a key set
on everything, certain rig logic is now
primed to work properly. Things like
IKFK snapping, a lot of those kinds of
things inside of Unreal, they expect you
to have a key frame somewhere so it
knows to look for changes. That way,
snapping from IK to FK, it makes the
evaluation work better. And uh, you
know, it also will set appropriate auto
key changes when you make those kinds of
adjustments. So anyway, first thing to
